sentences.en: A surgeon removed the boy's brain tumor.
sentences.cn: 一位外科医生为这男孩摘除了脑肿瘤.

sentences.en: Antigen density on the tumor cell surface influences the cytotoxic sensitivity.
sentences.cn: 瘤细胞表面的抗原密度影响细胞毒的敏感性.

sentences.en: Areas of necrosis and cavitation may occur within the tumor.
sentences.cn: 肿瘤内可以有坏死和成腔区.

sentences.en: He literally pulled those cells out of their blood and grew billions more of them in laboratory dishes, enough to have a chance at overwhelming a tumor.
sentences.cn: 他精确地把那些细胞从他们的血液中抽离出来，在实验室的培养皿中让其增值数十亿倍，大到足以有可能制服一个肿瘤。

sentences.en: Hepatoma cells are differentiated tumor cells derived from liver.
sentences.cn: 肝癌细胞是来自肝脏的分化的肿瘤细胞.

sentences.en: Meanwhile the untreated tumor is still growing.
sentences.cn: 这时未经治疗的肿瘤还继续生长.

sentences.en: Staging of prostatic adenocarcinoma is based upon how extensive the tumor is.
sentences.cn: 前列腺腺癌的分级是根据肿瘤的浸润程度而定的。

sentences.en: The ability of humoral antibodies to inhibit tumor growth varies with different cell types.
sentences.cn: 体液抗体抑制肿瘤生长的能力因细胞类型不同而异.

sentences.en: The surgeon cut away the tumor with expert skill.
sentences.cn: 外科大夫以熟练的技术把肿瘤割掉.
外科大夫用X射线照射瘤.

sentences.en: The tumor in his prostate gland was caught at an early and very likely curable stage.
sentences.cn: 由于他的前列腺肿瘤是在早期被发现的,处在很有可能治愈阶段.

sentences.en: The tumor may be smooth or lobulated.
The tumor may prolapse through the orifice.
The tumor proliferates, invades the uterine wall, and disseminates to remote organs.
sentences.cn: 肿瘤增殖, 侵犯到子宫壁, 并播散至远处的脏器.

sentences.en: The tumor will soon be resolved.
sentences.cn: 这个肿瘤很快就会消掉的。

sentences.en: This can sometimes reveal a hardening or lump that signals a tumor.
sentences.cn: 这样有时能发现硬物或肿块,这是肿瘤的信号.

sentences.en: This tumor has gelatinous material within it.
Virchow in 1851 presented a drawing of a multinucleate tumor cell.
sentences.cn: Virchow于一八五一年发表一张多核肿瘤细胞图.

sentences.en: When do you think the patient can be operated on for the tumor?
sentences.cn: 你认为这个病人什么时候可以做肿瘤手术？

phrases.tran_cn: 卵黄囊瘤；卵巢内胚层窦瘤

trans.tran_en: a mass of diseased cells in your body that have divided and increased too quickly
